solution_line_template: Mark played for a total of {first_play_time} + {second_play_time} = <<{first_play_time}+{second_play_time}={total_play_time}>>{total_play_time} minutes.
So, he was on the sideline for {total_game_duration} - {total_play_time} = <<{total_game_duration}-{total_play_time}={sideline_time}>>{sideline_time} minutes.
